alert.note: Alert for Adams; Clark; Jackson; Juneau; Monroe (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LaCrosse (Southwestern Wisconsin, Southeastern Minnesota, and Northeast Iowa)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 25 at 3:29PM CDT by NWS LaCrosse
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southern Clark, eastern Jackson, northwestern Juneau, northern Adams and northeastern Monroe Counties through 430 PM CDT... At 326 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a cluster of strong thunderstorms near Babcock, or north of Tomah, moving southeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Necedah around 350 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by this storm include New Miner, The Black River Correctional Center, Highways 13 And 21, Potters Flowage, Lynn, County Roads G And O, County Roads C And G, Shennington, The Rezin Landing Strip and County Roads D And W. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
